alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Hancock; Jefferson; Johnson; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Baldwin, northeastern Wilkinson, south central Hancock, Washington, northwestern Johnson and west central Jefferson Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Linton to near Hebron to Irwinton, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sandersville, Irwinton, Davisboro, Tennille, McIntyre, Harrison, Toomsboro, Oconee, Deepstep, Riddleville, Downs, Warthen, Linton, Grange, Stapletons Crossroads, and Hebron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Hancock; Jefferson; Johnson; Washington; Wilkinson
